Interface LayoutRegionListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
LayoutRegionListenerAdapter
public interface LayoutRegionListener

          Fires before a panel is removed (or closed).

          Fires when this region slides out of view.
 void onSlideShow(LayoutRegion region)

          Fires when this region is shown or hidden.
 

Method Detail

doBeforeRemove

boolean doBeforeRemove(LayoutRegion region,
                       ContentPanel panel)
Fires before a panel is removed (or closed). To cancel the removal return false.

Parameters:
region - this
panel - the panel
Returns:
false to cancel removal

onResized

void onResized(LayoutRegion region,
               int newSize)
Fires when the user resizes this region.

Parameters:
region - this
newSize - The new size (width for east/west, height for north/south)

onVisibilityChange
